# gsDesign R Package Documentation

## Overview

The gsDesign package provides comprehensive tools for group sequential clinical trial design.

## Key Functions

- gsDesign(): Create group sequential designs
- gsSurv(): Design for survival endpoints
- nSurv(): Sample size calculation for survival trials
- gsCP(): Conditional power calculations

## Example Usage

library(gsDesign)
design <- gsDesign(k = 3, test.type = 1, alpha = 0.025, beta = 0.1)
